biocontainers.name: amas
biocontainers.summary: Calculate various summary statistics on a multiple sequence alignment

biotools.summary: AMAS (Alignment Manipulation And Summary), a tool that works on amino acid and nucleotide alignments and combines capabilities of sequence manipulation with a function that calculates basic statistics.

bioschemas.name: AMAS
bioschemas.summary: AMAS (Alignment Manipulation And Summary), a tool that works on amino acid and nucleotide alignments and combines capabilities of sequence manipulation with a function that calculates basic statistics.
